description: The phone comes with a 6.20-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1440x3200 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9.

description: There’s no phone like iPhone.

description: This is everything you'd want in a premium, durable, 5G smartphone.1 Then we made it unfold—revealing a massive screen so you can watch, work and play like never before.

name: Xiaomi 11T Pro
description: The highest-end 11T Pro is the most compelling phone of the trio, and lets Xiaomi offer a more budget-friendly alternative to the Chinese phone-maker's pricier Mi 11 flagship series.

description: Xiaomi Watch Revolve

description: The larger display enhances the entire experience, making Apple Watch easier to use and read. Series 7 represents our biggest and brightest thinking yet.

name: LG 4k Ultra HD
description: With a resolution which is four times higher than Full HD and with 8.3 million pixels, this TV delivers detailed and flawless image quality.

description: High-Dynamic Range levels up bright expression of your TV, so you can enjoy an immense spectrum of colors and visual details, even in dark scenes.

name: Mi QLED TV 4K 55
description: Experience The Magic of QLED Display in 4K Resolution

name: ASUS CG32UQ
description: ASUS CG32UQ delivers superior picture quality with 4K resolution, HDR10 support and VESA DisplayHDR 600 certified

name: 49'' Odyssey Neo G9 Gaming DQHD Quantum Mini-LED Monitor
description: An industry defining 49” 1000R curved screen, equipped with a cutting edge Quantum Matrix HDR2000 panel, 240hz refresh rate, G-Sync and FreeSync Premium Pro support, 1ms response rates, and fully customizable Odyssey Infinity Core lighting.

name: 24'' CRG5 Gaming Monitor
description: An 1800R curved screen pulls you in and immerses you in the action• 144Hz Refresh rate gives you clear images even in fast action scenes

name: Samsung - UR55 Series 28'' IPS 4K UHD Monitor
description: The Samsung UR55 IPS 4K UHD monitor delivers stunning images composed of 8 million pixels for even more intricate detail. Experience unparalleled realism when gaming or enjoying movies.

name: Samsung - AM702 Series LS43AM702UNXZA 43'' Smart Tizen 4K UHD Monitor - Black
description: Go bigger, work smarter, and enjoy more – with a versatile screen that maximizes productivity and enhances entertainment.

name: LG 27” IPS 4K UHD Monitor with VESA Display HDR 400
description: Innovation powers your productivity and entertainment. LG UltraFine™ Monitors are known for immersive viewing, but they also shine as productivity powerhouses, delivering a flexible workstation experience and easy setup.

name: MSI - Optix 27'' LED Curved QHD FreeSync Monitor (DisplayPort, HDMI, DVI) - Black
description: Enjoy detailed visuals while gaming with this curved 27-inch MSI Optix QHD (2560 x 1440) monitor. The 1 ms response time minimizes blurring, streaking and ghosting for smooth gameplay, while AMD FreeSync technology eliminates input lag for stutter-free and tear-free visuals.

name: Dell - S3220DGF 32'' LED Curved QHD FreeSync Monitor with HDR
description: Enjoy stunning panoramic views during gameplay with this Dell 32-inch curved gaming monitor. A vibrant 2560 x 1440 resolution coupled with a contrast ratio of 3000:1 delivers precise colors for an immersive gaming experience.

name: Samsung - CHG9 Series C49HG90DMN 49'' HDR LED Curved FHD FreeSync Monitor
description: Enhance your gaming experience with this 49-inch Samsung curved gaming monitor. Quantum Dot technology delivers 1 billion shades of color with extra deep blacks and a black equalizer to let you see what's lurking in every corner. The superfast response time of this Samsung curved gaming monitor reduces motion blur to support your play.

name: NETGEAR - AC1750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 5 Router - Black
description: The NETGEAR AC1750 Smart WiFi 5 Router with external antennas delivers extremely fast WiFi. With AC1750 WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet speeds, and high-powered external antennas, this router offers ultimate performance in wireless coverage for large homes with 12 or more wireless devices. It gets 3x faster access than similar 802.11n.

name: ASUS AX5400 Dual Band Mesh WiFi 6 Gaming Router
description: The NETGEAR AC1750 Smart WiFi 5 Router with external antennas delivers extremely fast WiFi. With AC1750 WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet speeds, and high-powered external antennas, this router offers ultimate performance in wireless coverage for large homes with 12 or more wireless devices. It gets 3x faster access than similar 802.11n.

name: ASUS - ROG Rapture AX11000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router
description: The NETGEAR AC1750 Smart WiFi 5 Router with external antennas delivers extremely fast WiFi. With AC1750 WiFi, Gigabit Ethernet speeds, and high-powered external antennas, this router offers ultimate performance in wireless coverage for large homes with 12 or more wireless devices. It gets 3x faster access than similar 802.11n.

name: Epson - EX3280 3LCD XGA Projector with Built-in Speaker
description: Impress your audience and own the room with the ultra bright EX3280 projector, offering 3,600 lumens of color and white brightness1 to deliver crisp, detailed presentations, spreadsheets and videos – even in well-lit spaces.

name: Vankyo - Leisure 470 Wireless Mini Projector
description: VANKYO Leisure 470 mini projector is full HD 1080P supported. Synchornize your smartphone screen on the up to 250’’ Display. This wifi enabled, portable projector is compatible with TV Sticks, PS4, HDMI, VGA, TF, AV, and USB.

name: LG - CineBeam PH30N 720p Wireless DLP Projector
description: Achieve a movie theater viewing experience using this LG CineBeam LED projector. A built-in battery provides up to 2 hours of video playback, while Miracast technology lets you mirror portable smart devices. This LG CineBeam LED projector delivers HD resolution for crisp images, and integrated USB and HDMI inputs allow quick connections with external hardware.

name: HP - LaserJet Pro M283fdw Wireless Color All-In-One Laser Printer
description: An efficient, wireless MFP with fax for high-quality color and productivity. Save time with Smart Tasks in the HP Smart app, and print and scan from your phone.* Get seamless connections and strong security designed to help detect and stop attacks.

name: Epson - EcoTank Pro ET-5800 Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer
description: Produce high-quality documents with this Epson EcoTank Pro multifunction printer. Print speeds up to 25 ISO ppm* make short work of large jobs, and the maximum resolution of 4800 x 2400 dpi ensures clear text and crisp images. This Epson EcoTank Pro multifunction printer produces up to 23 copies per minute.

name: HP - OfficeJet Pro 8025e Wireless All-In-One Inkjet Printer
description: The HP OfficeJet Pro 8025e delivers increased productivity with fast speeds and custom mobile shortcuts. It includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date, secure, and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time. Optional HP+ system requires an HP account, internet connection, and use of only Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.

name: RAZER HUNTSMAN V2
description: If all-out advantage is more your speed, arm yourself with responsiveness that’s second to none. Meet the Razer Huntsman V2— an optical gaming keyboard with near-zero input latency and fully geared out with other high-end features to make it the complete package.

name: RAZER BlackWidow Mini V2
description: Compact enough for any space, and versatile enough for all setups—this is the Razer BlackWidow V3 Mini HyperSpeed. Enjoy seamless gaming in a sleek package with a wireless 65% mechanical gaming keyboard that’s the perfect balance of form and function.

name: Redragon K552 Mechanical Keyboard
description: Tenkeyless compact mechanical gaming keyboard Redragon k552 tkl small compact with dust proof mechanical switches cherry blue equivalent Linear switches quiet click sound fast action with minimal resistance without a tactile bump feel.

name: Keypro Macaron Mechanical Keyboard
description: Minimal Mechanical Keyboard.

name: Razer Basilisk V3
description: Create, control, and champion your playstyle with the new Razer Basilisk V3—the quintessential ergonomic gaming mouse for customized performance.

name: LOGITECH PEBBLE WIRELESS MOUSE M350
description: Make any space minimalist, modern, and silent with Logitech Pebble – the portable mouse that fits your curated lifestyle and goes wherever life takes you.

name: MX Master 3
description: MX Master 3 is instant precision and infinite potential. It’s the most advanced Master Series mouse yet – designed for creatives and engineered for coders. If you can think it, you can master it.

name: ROG Zephyrus G15 GA503
description: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G15 turned out to be a very pleasing gaming device combining powerful hardware, beautiful design, good battery life, high-quality screen, and acoustics.

name: ROG Zephyrus Duo 15 SE GX551
description: Work and play on the cutting-edge with up to a AMD Ryzen™ 9 5900HX CPU and NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 3080 GPU. The overclockable CPU offers serious speed for intensive tasks like photo editing, 3D rendering, and streaming, running on up to 50W of sustained power when the GPU is active and 90W on its own.

name: Legion 7i Gen 6 Intel (16'') with RTX 3060
description: Gaming will never be the same after experiencing 11th Generation Intel® Core™ H-Series processors. Play and stream the latest AAA Titles at their absolute best with up to 5GHz clock speeds on multiple cores, enhanced overclocking, 45 Watts of dedicated processing power, up to 8 cores and 24MB of Intel® Smart Cache.

name: Alienware M15 Ryzen™ Edition R5 Gaming Laptop
description: Whether you're gaming at your leisure or in the thick of battle, never miss any critical details thanks to smoother gameplay. A result of our deliberate engineering decisions, the latest m15 is incredibly fast starting from 165Hz.

name: Asus Zenbook 14 UX433
description: Creativity. Style. Innovation. These are the qualities that define the elegant new ZenBook 14. It’s one of the world’s smallest 14-inch laptops, and features the breathtaking frameless NanoEdge display and the exclusive NumberPad to give you the freedom to discover your creative power.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X380 Yoga
description: The sleek ThinkPad X380 Yoga is designed for you. This stylish powerhouse adapts to work with you—as a laptop, tablet, or anything in between. Moreover, hardware-level security features provide peace of mind when you're on-the-go.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad 5i (15'')
description: The IdeaPad 5i (15'') Intel boasts an enticing list of included and optional features, making it a powerful combination of performance, connectivity, and entertainment with up to 10th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 processing.

name: Macbook Pro 13''
description: The Apple M1 chip gives the 13‑inch MacBook Pro speed and power beyond belief.

name: Acer Swift 5
description: Designed on the Intel® Evo™ platform for an exceptional experience anywhere, the Swift 5 weighs in at around 1 kg, is just 14.95 mm thin, and boasts an incredible 90% screen-to-body ratio. With up to 17 hours of battery, stay mobile and stay productive.

name: Playstation
description: Experience lightning-fast loading with an ultra-high speed SSD, deeper immersion with support for haptic feedback, adaptive triggers and 3D Audio*, and an all-new generation of incredible PlayStation® games.

name: Playstation 4
description: The PS4 console, delivering awesome gaming power, incredible entertainment and vibrant HDR technology

name: Playstation 4
description: Blur the lines of reality with the PlayStation®4 Pro console. Faster, more powerful and with 4K TV gaming.

name: XBox Series X
description: The Xbox Series X delivers sensationally smooth frame rates of up to 120FPS with the visual pop of HDR. Immerse yourself with sharper characters, brighter worlds, and impossible details with true-to-life 4K.

name: XBox Series S
description: The next generation of gaming brings our largest digital launch library yet to our smallest Xbox ever. With more dynamic worlds, faster load times, and the addition of Xbox Game Pass (sold separately), the all-digital Xbox Series S is the best value in gaming.

name: XBox One X S
description: Experience immersive 4K gaming, where action is brought to life with 2160p frame buffers and 6 Teraflops of graphical processing power.

name: Nintendo Switch – OLED Model
description: The new system features a vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, a wide adjustable stand, a dock with a wired LAN port, 64 GB of internal storage, and enhanced audio.

name: Nintendo Switch – OLED Model
description: Nintendo Switch is designed to fit your life, transforming from home console to portable system in a snap.

name: Steam Deck
description: The Steam Deck was built for extended play sessions—whether you're using thumbsticks or trackpads—with full-size controls positioned perfectly within your reach
